title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull, list, delete models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node, Deno & browsers; same API surface as the Python client.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain community integration: use any Ollama model as an LLM or chat component inside LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-like): multi-model chats, PDF uploads, RAG, user auth, dark mode.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based TUI client for Ollama with syntax highlighting, history, model switching and keybindings.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot chat pane; supports code completion & explanation.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama with Kotlin & Spring Boot examples; sync/async, streaming, typed POJOs.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB; ingest PDFs, query via FastAPI.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that chats or generates code using any local Ollama model; slash commands & threads.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node-affinity and PVC support.

title: ollama-models
summary: Community-curated Modelfile collection: quantized Llama-3, Phi-3, CodeLlama, Zephyr with example prompts.

title: ollama-chat
summary: Lightweight Node package exposing a chat server with SSE streaming; plugs into Express or Fastify.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with async enumerable streaming, dependency-injection helpers, and MAUI sample app.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a CI service; pre-pull models and run generative tests in your pipeline.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that answers questions using local Ollama models; supports threads, reactions, and model switching.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration: use Ollama models as generators or rankers in Haystack 2.0 pipelines.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for local AI autocomplete; generates summaries, outlines, or rewrites inside your vault.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim client library for Ollama with native async/await and optional JSON marshalling.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async client for Ollama; includes Tokio & Axum example server.
